translations: n.听力学家；听觉病矫治专家

phrs.translation: 听力学家, 听觉病矫治专家
听力和口齿矫正医生, 听力语音病理学家, 听觉和语言矫治医生, 听力及语言训练师
听觉专家和语音语言病理学家

sentences.sentence: Offices of Physical, Occupational and Speech Therapists, and Audiologists: 10.6%.
sentences.translation: 身体、职业医疗、言语治疗师和听力学医师诊所：10.6%。

sentences.sentence: Jobs similar to this include audiologists, chiropractors, physical therapist assistants, and speech language pathologists.
sentences.translation: 与此类似的工作还有耳科医生，脊骨神经科医生，运动康复治疗助理和语言语音病理学家。

sentences.sentence: Audiologists and speech-language pathologists diagnose, evaluate and treat human communication disorders including hearing, speech, language and voice disorders.
sentences.translation: 听力学家和语言语音病理学家诊断，评估和治疗人类在沟通方面的障碍其中包括听觉，语言，语音和声音障碍。
